items.content_html: HodlEye is a lightweight and efficient crypto price tracker designed for real-time market updates. With a minimalist interface, it provides fast and accurate price insights, perfect for hodlers and traders.

items.content_html: A sleek and modern developer portfolio built with React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/UI, designed to showcase skills, projects, and experience in an optimized and responsive layout. This portfolio is fast and lightweight, powered by Vite for optimal performance, and features a customizable UI styled with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI.

items.content_html: Notes App is a lightweight browser-based note-taking tool with color-coding, categorization, and search features. Pin important notes, toggle dark mode, and resize notes as needed. Built with JavaScript and IndexedDB for offline storage, it requires no server to run.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses.

Pin important notes, toggle dark mode, and resize notes as needed. Built with JavaScript and IndexedDB for offline storage, it requires no server to run.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses.

items.content_html: A Vibe-Coded TRON-inspired infinite UNIX terminal animation with retro CRT effects, built using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features multi-phase command sequences, realistic typing simulation, and customizable sci-fi aesthetics — all in a lightweight, dependency-free package.
items.title: atoomnetmarc/Infinite-UNIX-Terminal: A Vibe-Coded TRON-inspired infinite UNIX terminal animation with retro CRT effects, built using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features multi-phase command sequences, realistic typing simulation, and customizable sci-fi aesthetics — all in a lightweight, dependency-free package.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
